Question: FLC Technology Group CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
FLC Technology Group

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- New line of wireless earbuds with advanced noise-cancellation technology
- Enhanced battery life for extended listening sessions
- Improved connectivity and seamless pairing with devices
- Sleek and ergonomic design for comfortable wear
- Integration of AI-assisted voice commands for hands-free operation
- Support for high-quality audio codecs for superior sound performance
Summary_cn:
FLC科技集团

CES 2024产品亮点：

- 具有先进降噪技术的新一代无线耳机系列
- 增强电池续航时间，适合长时间聆听
- 改进的无缝连接和与设备配对的功能
- 时尚人体工程学设计，舒适佩戴
- 支持AI辅助语音命令，实现免提操作
- 支持高品质音频编解码器，提供卓越音质表现
